title: Planted Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C (480°F). If using a pizza stone, place it in the oven while preheating for at least 30 minutes.
Slice or shred the planted into thin pieces. Sauté briefly in a hot pan until lightly browned, about 2-3 minutes.
Stretch or roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness on a floured surface.
Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce or passata over the dough, leaving a small border for the crust.
Top with the sautéed planted, sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, and generous amounts of vegan mozzarella.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from oven, drizzle with olive oil, and top with fresh basil leaves. Slice and serve immediately.
